summary: A collection of helper utilities for managing dates, times, and calendar systems within xarray-based climate data workflows. It includes conversion between standard datetime objects and decimal years, creation and manipulation of CFTimeIndex objects, handling of various calendar conventions (e.g., Gregorian, 360‑day), interpolation and resampling of time coordinates, and calculation of day‑of‑year based statistics.
business_intent: Enable accurate and flexible time‑series operations in climate and environmental analytics by abstracting calendar complexities, supporting multiple calendar types, and providing reliable date arithmetic for downstream index calculations and model evaluations.
